structure.unit: COUNTY ROAD ENGINEER AND MAINTENANCE OF PUBLIC ROADS

law.catch_line: Counties may spend county road funds.
law.text: Nothing in KRS 179.410 and 179.415 shall prohibit any county from spending county road funds for the further and additional maintenance, reconstruction and improvement of county roads.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4308-6.
